categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Torsin was a male who served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire, leading a squad on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. Torsin's unit was tasked with reclaiming the Stillwater Farms in the Gorinth Agricultural Sector, but carried a set of RK-9 soil devastators as a last resort. Torsin's unit was killed by the Balmorran resistance, but Imperial forces came upon their bodies and were asked by Captain Ardmore, Torsin's superior, to destroy the farms with the soil devastators.
Torsin's body starts the mission "Salting the Fields" for Imperial players in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
